lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Jigu chen la nepa desh\nSako dye ya dathi la x2
Changu jila ratana\nChangu mane g tana
Thwo joban Changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Lyama woma daju chala\nPili pili hisi du x2
Hisi daya maga Bhaju\nAamdani guli du
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Prithivi ya devi cha la\nba ba laka punka te x2
Changu lagi bank balance\nhisi laka munka te
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Jagir maru pasa maru\nhisi laka geh munki x2
Naki Twonki fuka sita\nSchool le geh wonki
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Nhapa ya pi lhasa sau\nDhuku danka dheba du x2
G mi thya chen bhau macha\ncha then jama magu kha
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Kali yuge fuka kha\nbishwash gathe yagu g x2
Chuta aanga magula sa\nsuita akshyar dhyagu g
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Mohni bale swa go kya wo\nchene chui nali swa x2
Mwa maru sanka ya mate\ndyo then chwo g mi ma
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Maju Paju nhayku byu sa\nda ba da ya lagi jui x2
Nhu Nhu bale sakasina\nbhama chi ta swa na chui
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Sampati doko chanta\nadya pass yana bi x2
Ja thu keh thu ya mya cha\nnokar chama taya bi
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Haku parsi sina weh g\nnokar chakar chu he mwa x2
Newa juya mwa dhu pinta\naah di ta pu ya mwa
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Newa dhai p newa heh jui\nmaya daya gaka du x2
G gu maan the ehh maiya\nchangu maan na ehh ye du
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Changu khwa la haku sa na\nmaan la changu tui khani x2
Haku sihna nila ki la\nkhwa yeh jha jha dha khani
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Puhni si ya timila then\nhisi du ma eeh maiju x2
Haku sinhna lo wo na la\ng la changu maan ne du
Thwo joban changu lagi kha x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Haku sinhna jaka makhu\ncha kha lai gu lo wo na x2
Nhani lyuni nhyathya swosa\nchanta jaga g khana
Thwo joban changu lagi kha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: G ta cha dhathe yo sa\nchimthya chen dyake hai x2
Gane dyo tha nhyane chowna\nchanta sincha chyaka hai
Thwo joban changu lagi kha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: G gu maan la sarga te\njhanga bwoi the bwekala x2
Chu ya chu ya gula g ta\nchu chu maane waikala
Thwo joban changu lagi kha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Jata jwona kya woni nu\nsite guble daigu jui x2
Yo tyo jhi jui dhunkala\nmaan ne swa whola jhi
Thwo joban changu lagi kha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Shreepanchami site swe mwa\njanti jwona ka wa cha x2
Bhamcha juya piya chowni\nbaja jwona ka wa cha
Thwo joban changu lagi kha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Mutsi lali khwale powder\nmikhya aaja taya ti x2
Nhyoni Nhyoni janti dai\nJhyale swoya cha sati
Thwo joban changu lagi kha

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Jawa Khawa kalas taya\nlasakusa ya mala x2
Wonki bale sa ma ya\nKhwa ye balai tisa na
Thwo joban changu lagi kha
